post_info.post_title: The Platt Amendment: Does the US have a obligation in Cuba?

Perhaps you could provide us with more information...

Wha do you think?

 
 America has an obligation to end its stupid sanctions. America has an obligation to learn that people with a different culture and way of life have a right to live!

America has an obligation to end its stupid sanctions. America has an obligation to learn that people with a different culture and way of life have a right to live!

 
 I think it is time to end the sanctions as well. They were put in place for a good reason but those reasons are long gone now. Castro is a shadow of his former self and the country is no longer a threat to us in any way. It won't be long before Castro is dead and the country is ready to start over either with another dictator or with a democracy. I think lifting sanctions would allow for us to have more influence on Cuba and try to organize a democratic movement there which would not only benefit us but also benefit the people of Cuba.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  The Platt Amendment: Does the US have a obligation in Cuba?
